attributes.action: demonstrate solidarity with the Tanna people of Vanuatu in their aim of repatriating Prince Philip to the Island of Tanna where he is revered as a God. We urge the government to make representation to the Crown to support this move.This would ensure close and harmonious ties between the two nations.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Request to enable Prince Philip to be repatriated to the Island of Tanna where he is revered as a God.  We urge the Government to enable this to happen as soon as possible.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
